pages.text: $(item)Distorted Matter$() is an umbrella term for all magically manipulated matter; however, in this entry, it will focus on two of those: $(marked)Maganized Matter$() and $(marked)Chaotic Matter$().$(br)These two products of failed matter manipulation are often important ingredients for other items, like the $(l:alchemy/entry_entropizing_catalyst)Entropizing Catalyst$().

The most common ways of fabricating Maganized Matter are failing a recipe with the $(l:manipulation/entry_basin)Infusion Basin$(), which is quite easy to do, and failing a recipe with the $(l:manipulation/entry_tunneler)Tunnele$()r with an ingredient that has a valid recipe.

Chaotic Matter can be created by failing a recipe with the $(l:manipulation/entry_concentrator)Concentrator$(), or by failing a recipe with the $(l:manipulation/entry_tunneler)Tunneler$() without an ingredient that has a valid recipe.
